summary: Provides a suite of automated tests that invoke an external launcher script to run DeepSpeed training and inference across single and multiple GPUs, checking various configurations such as distributed execution, precision modes, language modeling, evaluation without training, and checkpoint resumption.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, scalability, and robustness of DeepSpeed-powered models in production environments, ensuring that different training setups and hardware configurations behave as expected before deployment.
